main.name: Luis Fuentes
main.description: I'm Dallas, Texas based Software Engineer with extensive education in Web Development. Let's start scrolling and learn more about me
main.bio: My name is Luis Fuentes, I'm a Full Stack Web Developer graduated from Kenzie Academy. Currently I'm looking for a job into Software Engineering to get professional experience and develop amazing projects.

education.description: Pursuing a bachelor's degree in Computer Science. Expected graduation in October 2024.
Graduated with Front-End and Full-Stack Web Development certifications.

education.program: Technical Systems and Security Certification Program
education.description: Obtained CompTIA certifications such as A+, Server+, Network+, and Security+. MTA Fundamentals certificationes and Linux Essentials.

work.description: Perform 1st level support and escalate issues to Tier II support if unable to resolve through initial triage and troubleshooting that are within the Command Center operating procedures for Latin American countries business environments to ensure all Quality Initiatives and Service Level Agreements were achieved daily.
Staffing support helping out campus technicians to assist them installing Chromebooks in Rockwall, TX high schools.
Consulting inventory reports, unpacking merchandise, arranging items on shelves, updating activity records, taking safety precautions, collaborating with watchmen, and reporting to managers.

projects.description: Overdrive Library is a Python/Django project that recreates an online library's backend. Team project for final Capstone (second semester) at Kenzie Academy
